alert.note: Alert for Lyon; O'Brien; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:58PM CDT until July 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR EASTERN LYON...WESTERN OSCEOLA...NORTHWESTERN O`BRIEN...JACKSON AND NOBLES COUNTIES... At 557 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Rushmore to 6 miles south of Jackson to near High Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Alpha, Kinbrae, Wilder, Dundee, Okabena and Bigelow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
